Topic.Title: Commands Fail to Convert (Quest 5 to QJS Convertor)

Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to use the _Quest 5 to QJS Convertor_ but the script is failing to convert the commands. It's giving me this unhelpful error message:

```Hmm, something went wrong there. Perhaps you missed part of it. You need everything from "```

Functions, objects, settings, and styles all convert without issue. I've tried copying and pasting from different programs in case it was a weird spacing/formatting issue, including both Quest and Notepad++.

What can I check to find the issue? I assume this has something to do with the verbs? I can do the translation by hand if needed, so long as I know what this button is supposed to translate.
Posts.HTML:
I'm trying to use the Quest 5 to QJS Convertor but the script is failing to convert the commands. It's giving me this unhelpful error message:

Hmm, something went wrong there. Perhaps you missed part of it. You need everything from "

Functions, objects, settings, and styles all convert without issue. I've tried copying and pasting from different programs in case it was a weird spacing/formatting issue, including both Quest and Notepad++.

What can I check to find the issue? I assume this has something to do with the verbs? I can do the translation by hand if needed, so long as I know what this button is supposed to translate.

Posts.EditableText: Someone (possibly you?) started an issue about this on Github. It has now been resolved, but has highlighted that verbs do not get done yet, but hopefully will soon.
Posts.HTML: Someone (possibly you?) started an issue about this on Github. It has now been resolved, but has highlighted that verbs do not get done yet, but hopefully will soon.

Posts.EditableText: I have uploaded to Github a new version (but not a release) that includes verbs. See how it goes.
